title: Can't reinstall
body: I've recently tried to get back into league to play with some friends and the install isn't working for me. At first it would tell me that an older version of league of legends was not uninstalled. I looked up a forum for that problem and it told me to try the Hextech Repair Tool. When I try reinstalling through that tool it gives me an **Error 1610 attempting to install package into my roaming folders.** I have no idea what to do at this point has anyone ever experienced this?

replies.body: I this this problem might be caused by a security setting that's not allowing your HRT or patcher to scan your game files.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your OS is allowing league as an exception.  Let me know if that helps!
